channel.title: Portfolios on Asa Needle's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Asa Needle's Website

item.title: Project: Get Movie Recommendations (from my personal favorites)
item.description: Link: https://my-film-club.herokuapp.com/ This is a project I made in 2020, so I could play around with data from my Letterboxd account (Letterboxd is a website that lets you log and rate movies you’ve watch). Movies I’ve rated at least a 3.5/5 are recommended based on genre.

item.title: Project: How to Win Philosophy and Influence People
item.description: Link: https://wikipedia-map.herokuapp.com/ This was a project that I made while at the Recurse Center using the Wikipedia API and Beautiful Soup, and Flask to put it on the internet. Here is the front page. Here is an example, using the philosopher Edward Said.
